text: Kɨ fomɨra Masedonian Provinsɨn ghughava, dughiar kamɨn kɨ akar gavgavir mam nɨ ganɨngi, egha datɨrɨghɨn kɨ akar kamra ua kamaghɨn nɨ mɨkɨmasa. Kɨ ghaze, nɨ Efesusɨn Nguibar Ekiamɨn ikɨva gumazir maba mɨgɨrɨgɨar gavgavim me danɨng suam, me gumazamiziba Godɨn akamɨn men sure damuva, akar ifavarir taba me damuvɨra ikian markɨ.
